biotools.summary:
Gexplora – user interface that highlights and explores the density of genomic elements along a chromosomal sequence.

plotting the density of genetic elements along a chromosome using GTF files (ideally from Ensembl) as input and using REST API calls to Ensembl, OMA and STRING database (to be done).
